scripts.test:api:local: docker-compose -f infra/local/docker-compose.yml up -d postgres redis && sleep 5 && pnpm --filter api exec prisma migrate dev && pnpm --filter api test && docker-compose -f infra/local/docker-compose.yml down
scripts.generate:sdk: GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID=dummy GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET=dummy GOOGLE_CALLBACK_URL=http://localhost pnpm run generate:sdk:run
scripts.generate:sdk:run: wait-on http://localhost:3001/docs-json && npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i http://localhost:3001/docs-json -g typescript-axios -o packages/sdk
